Lakewood.Westin Hotel Cleveland: The Westin Hotel Cleveland is a modernist 1975-opened 222 foot, 22 story, 484 room Westin high-rise hotel in downtown Cleveland in the city's Civic Center district. The tower rooms sit on top of a multi-story built-in parking garage.The hotel sits along St. Clair Avenue and features rainbow lighting running length wise along its multilevel parking deck at night.
